title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.15 - Observation decks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.15 - Observation decks

State Regulations

The fee for admission upon the observation decks at

John F. Kennedy International Airport shall be 10 cents. There shall be no fee
for such admission in the case of children under 12 years of age accompanied by
an adult and such children shall not be admitted upon such observation decks
unless so accompanied. The fee for admission upon the observation deck on the
10th floor of the control tower at John F. Kennedy International Airport shall
be 50 cents for adults and 25 cents for children under 12 years of age
accompanied by an adult, and such children shall not be admitted upon such
observation deck unless so accompanied. Notes

1263.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
